name: Welcome to Rich Art
description:
Gameplay:

You're a thief in the Rich Art Museum..
Try to steal as many valuable objects as possible!
Be Aware that you can store only a limited amount of loot.. and that cameras can spot you!

Set quality to medium for lighting to work correctly!

Keyboard:

WASD to Move
Mouse / Arrows for Camera
E to Interact
Ctrl to Crouch
Shift to Sprint
Esc / F1 / P to Pause and go Back in menus

Controller:

D-Pad / Left stick to move
Right stick for Camera
Any face button to Interact
Left Shoulder buttons to Crouch
Right Shoulder button to Sprint
Start / Select to Pause and go Back in menus

Controls can be edited in game!

Credits:
Dandy - Coding, Character Mesh and Animations, UI
Misaki - Meshes, Materials, Texturing, Lighting, Menu and Level Design
Tsundereboy - Sound and Music
Max - Partecipation

Programs used:
Unreal Engine 4.18, Blender

Country: Italy
(Italy won't be rated for national contest rules)

Qualified for: Tiny Award  (91.62 mb / 150 mb)
